import React, { useState, useContext } from 'react' import "./styles.css" import menuContext from '../context/menuContext'; const Menu = () => { const { addMenu } = useContext(menuContext); const [menu, setMenu] = useState({name: "", category: "", menus: "", description: ""}) const handleClick = (e) =>{ e.preventDefault(); addMenu(menu.name, menu.category, menu.menus, menu.description); setMenu({name: "", category: "", menus: "", description: ""}) //props.showAlert("Added Successfully", "success"); } const onChange = (e) =>{ setMenu({...menu, [e.target.name]: e.target.value}) } return (

Add New Category

{/* */}
Card 1

{menu.menus}

{/*
Card 3

This is the content of card 3.

*/}
) } export default Menu
